records.quot: It’s not that I’m so smart, it’s just that I stay with problems longer.
records.author: Woody Allen

records.quot: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
records.author: Woody Allen

records.quot: I respect faith, but doubt is what gets you an education.
records.author: Wilson Mizner

records.quot: The greatest obstacle to discovery is not ignorance; it is the illusion of knowledge.
records.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

records.quot: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.
records.author: William Arthur Ward

records.quot: If you don’t make mistakes, you’re not working on hard enough problems. And that’s a big mistake.
records.author: Frank Wilczek

records.quot: You can never get enough of what you don’t really need.
records.author: Eric Hoffer

records.quot: Insanity: doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results.
records.author: Albert Einstein
